original_title: There Is Something About Our Friends 1: Our Twinks
overview: Editing and video designing Bel Ami movies, we are seeing dozens of picture-perfect models on our monitor every day. Our friends, who are also very beautiful, but who don't want to become professional models, kept bothering us with their wishes to try it in front of the camera until we decided to make this movie with them.  In this volume, we are happy to present you seven boys who in our view are OUR TWINKS. All of them are debuting in front of the camera.  Mel Roberts Jr, & Torsten Akssel
title: There Is Something About Our Friends 1: Our Twinks
